thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Graeme Arbery
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Graeme Arbery

author: Graeme Arbery
title: Graeme Arbery
text:
I read and listened to all I could from Solar Quote: s and learned a lot about the subject. It prepared me for discussions about our requirements with the installers whose names where provided by Solar Quote: s.
It was a difficult decision to pick one provider as all three that were suggested attended the house and were very professional and helpful in their presentations.
I have already provided the Solar Quote: s names to a number of people and suggested the use the site if they were interested in going to solar power.
